bonus: +1 bonus on attack rolls with throwing weapons
+1 to difficulty class for all saving throws against illusion spells cast by gnomes
+1 attack roll against kobolds and goblinoids
Speak with animals once per day
if charisma > 10; then once per day they can do dancing lights, ghost sound, and prestidigitation
Weapon Familiarity - Dwarves may treat dwarven war axes and dwarven urgroshes as martial weapons instead of exotic weapons
Stability - +4 bonus on ability checks made to be bull-rushed or tripped
+1 bonus attack roll agains orcs and goblinoids
+4 dodge bonus of armor class againt giant monsters
+2 bonus to appraise relating to stone
+2 bonus to craft relating to stone or metal
Elven Blood - for all effectrs related to race, a half-elf is considered an elf
+2 saving throw bonus against enchantment spells
Low Light Vision - twice as far as humans in low light

1.feats: Bardic music; Bardic knowledge; Countersong; Fascinate; Inspire courage 1

favoriteWeapon: Every Deity has a favorite weapon and every cleric considers it a point of pride to yeild that weapon. A cleric who choses the war-domain recieves the 'Weapon Focus Feat' related to that weapon as a bonus feat. He also recieves the appropriate matial weapon proficiency feat as a bonus feat if the weapon falls into that category.
alignment: Within 1 step of his deity's; exceptions are clerics of St. Cuthbert, who may chose only between Lawful good and Lawful Neutral. A cleric may not be Neutral unless his deity's alignment is also Neutral.

armorProficiency: No Metal Armor - only padded, leather or hide

1.feats: Animal companion; Nature sense; Wild empathy

armorProficiency: Not proficient with any armor or shields

1.feats: Bonus feat; Furry of blows; Unarmed strike

17.feats: Timeless body, Tongue of the sun and moon
